entry.title: 3M Automix 5895 - Automix Ez Sand Flex Parts Repair Kit 0 5 Fl. Oz. (14 ml) Tube 7000142647
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Repair Kits
Price: 67.74

[shortdesc]

3M Automix Ez Sand Flex Parts Repair Kit, 05895, 5 fl. oz. (147 ml) tube

  • Easy sanding and formulated for excellent featheredging, 3M™ Automix® Ez Sand Flex Parts Repair Kit, is a two-part epoxy used to repair most flexible plastic parts, including bumper covers and other plastic body panels
  • This product should not be used with SMC/fibreglass
  • It is designed for use with 3M™ Polyolefin Adhesion Promoter, 05907, and Marson® Large Paper Mixing Board, 20382.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Automix
    Adhesive Type Two-Part Epoxy
    Application Plastic repair
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Repair Kits
    Volume 5 oz

    Product Information

  • Two-component flexible epoxy finishing adhesive
  • 5 - 7 minute work time
  • 15 minute paint time
  • Easy sanding
  • Excellent featheredging properties

    • Suggested Application

  • Used to repair most flexible plastic parts, including bumper covers and other plastic body panels
  • This product is easy sanding and formulated for excellent featheredge
    		•

entry.title: 3M Automix 8224 - Automix Quick Fix Adhesive Kit 0 0.7 Oz. Adhesive/2.0 Oz. Accelerator 7000142622
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Repairs Kits
Price: 35.13

[shortdesc]

3M Automix Quick Fix Adhesive Kit, 08224, 0.7 oz. adhesive/2.0 oz. accelerator

  • 3M™ Automix® Quick Fix Adhesive Kit is a cyan acrylic adhesive kit used to bond rubber, metal and plastic
  • The accelerator, included in this kit, provides nearly instant bonding plus added strength, ideal for extremely quick, easy repairs of small pieces.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Automix
    Application Bonding
    Color Cyan
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Repairs Kits

    Product Information

  • Cyan acrylic adhesive
  • Nearly instant bonding plus added strength

    • Suggested Application

  • Used to bond rubber, metal and plastic
  • Ideal for extremely quick, easy repairs of small pieces

entry.title: 3M 8275 - Rigid Parts Repair Adhesive 0 13.5 Fl. Oz. (400 ml) 7000142715
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Repairs Kits
Price: 135.75

[shortdesc]

3M Rigid Parts Repair Adhesive, 08275, 13.5 fl. oz. (400 ml)

  • 3M™ Rigid Parts Repair Adhesive, 08275, is a two-part epoxy that is used to repair sheet molded compound (SMC), fibreglass reinforced polyester (FRP), and other rigid plastic parts
  • This product is designed for use as a filler and an adhesive
  • It is epoxy-based for easy sanding and is formulated for excellent featheredge.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Adhesive Type Epoxy
    Application Bonding
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Repairs Kits
    Volume 400 ml

    Product Information

  • Convenient , self-mixing feature
  • Helps ensure proper product ratio
  • Dispensed through 3M™ Performance Manual Applicator 08284

    • Suggested Application

  • Used to repair SMC, FRP (Traditional fibreglass) and other rigid plastic parts
  • Excellent choice for cosmetic repairs
    		•

entry.title: 3M Automix PN04247 - Automix Super Fast Plastic Repair Adhesive 200Ml 7000121226
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Repair Kits
Price: 90.83

[shortdesc]

3M Super Fast Plastic Repair, 04247, 6.8 fl. oz. (200 ml)

  • 3M™ Super Fast Plastic Repair, 04247, is a two-part urethane adhesive that consists of a base and accelerator
  • The two-parts are always mixed together
  • The repair has a very fast gel and cure time, and is designed to fit the 3M™ Automix™ Dispenser, 08117.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Automix
    Adhesive Type Urethane
    Application Plastic repair
    Color Clear
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Repair Kits
    Volume 200 ml

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ Super Fast Plastic Repair, 0PN04247 is in a 200mL cartridge to fit the 3M™ Automix™ Dispenser, PN08117.

    • Product Information

  • A high performance two-part semi-rigid urethane adhesive
  • Will not run or sag
  • Has excellent wide gap filling capabilities

    • Suggested Application

  • Used for rebuilding tabs and fixing broken eyelets
  • Can be used on architectural surfaces needing minor repairs.
